attributes.action: Every Friday at schools should be non-uniform
attributes.background: Every or every other Friday should be non-uniform in high schools or all schools because it means people can express themselves a bit. At the moment, school kills artists.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as its about something the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for. This would be the responsibility of your school. 

You might also wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
